org.elhan.utils

Class Globals

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elhan.utils.Globals

  • public class Globals
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the static required variables and methods

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String COLLECTION_NAME
      Name of the mongodb database collection.
      static java.lang.String COULD_NOT_CONNECT_TO_DATABASE
      If application cannot connect to server, then throws this data in exception.
      static java.lang.String DB_NAME
      Name of the mongodb database.
      static java.lang.String SUCCESFULLY_CREATED
      If a user succesfully created as a result of the POST operation, then application returns this data.
      static java.lang.String SUCCESFULLY_DELETED
      If a user succesfully deleted as a result of the DELETE operation, then application returns this data.
      static java.lang.String SUCCESFULLY_DROPPED
      If database dropped after a DELETE operation, then application returns this data.
      static java.lang.String SUCCESFULLY_UPDATED
      If a user succesfully updated as a result of the PUT operation, then application returns this data.
